title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when selecting SWT.MULTI
description: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. This behavior seems unexpected.
OB: When I select SWT.MULTI, the ControlExampleText beeps.
EB: When I select SWT.MULTI, the ControlExampleText should not beep.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Launch the ControlExampleText application.  
2. Select the SWT.MULTI option.  
3. Observe if the ControlExampleText beeps when selecting SWT.MULTI.
